RC2
JDT SmokeTest
http://www.zrh.oti.com/webprojects/jabiru2000/smoketest/smoke.htm
Going through the Java Resource Compare list
From the resource view, I copied a folder and renamed it.
I switched to the java perspective and got a dialog 'error occured in this
view'. The log file contains a few of these exceptions.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Mar 10, 2003 15:03:14.514
!MESSAGE Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Mar 10, 2003 15:03:14.542

The exact message dialog is:
An error has occured when activating this view

Cannot reproduce with either a new workspace or with chris' workspace that had 
this problem.  Will revisit this during next test pass, time permitting.

I suspect that this is the same problem as bug 35774 and bug 35244 (though 
these bugs appear as GP's on Solaris, they were disposed widget errors on 
hpux).  If so then this is now fixed, but I can't prove it since I couldn't 
reproduce it.  Will keep report open for now.

Closing since I haven't seen/heard about this since.  It seems like a bug that 
would have been fixed by the introduction of the focus proxy.
